snippet: The American Israel Public Affairs Committee plans to send 300 members to Capitol Hill on Tuesday to urge support for President Obama’s proposed strike on Syria.
abstract: American Israel Public Affairs Committee, powerful pro-Israel lobby, plans to dispatch 300 of its members to Capitol Hill as part of a broad campaign to press Congress to back Pres Obama's proposed strike on Syria.

byline.original: By JODI RUDOREN and ISABEL KERSHNER

lead_paragraph: The American Israel Public Affairs Committee plans to send 300 members to Capitol Hill on Tuesday to urge support for President Obama’s proposed strike on Syria.

headline.main: Lobbying Group for Israel to Press Congress on Syria
headline.print_headline: Lobbying Group for Israel To Press Congress on Syria
